column4: #ubuntu-offtopic is actually well populated and talks about the merits of filesystems a lot
You are making great contributions ? .. maybe you should go there and lighten the place up with your mannors ?
FileZilla is very good atm, its in the lead on the client side
But very bad taste in gui toolkits, because gtk+ rules
GTK is not very stable between versions.. Qt is a better piece of kit for standardising on
Oh, i thought QT was for the less code savvy... do we really want that lameness ?
